title: Borderlands
notes: Multiplayer not tested yet.  Cut scenes seem a little choppy, but otherwise the game runs fairly good with some settings cranked around medium to high at 1440p resolution.

title: Borderlands
notes: Littebit choppy but stable on max settings, it needs to run on windowed mode though, in fullscreen there's a "limit" on the monitor that doesn't let you turn the camera too much

title: borderlands
notes: playable but when the game load another stage crashes (pure virtual function being called while application was running(GIsRunning == 1))
specs: intel Core i5-6500 and GeForce GTX 1060 3GB

title: Borderlands
notes: Didn´t have to do any of the tweaks from the report sheet. Works very well and seems to be stable so far. When the mouse is moving to look the image can be a bit shakey.
